info.title: Academia World API
info.description: API for Academia World - Academic Event Management Platform

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token
Logout user and invalidate all access tokens
Verify user email address using verification token

400.description: Email already verified or user not found

get.description: Get a paginated list of published public events with filtering options

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in title, description, and tags

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Filter events starting from this date

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: Filter events ending before this date

post.description: Create a new event (automatically published for moderation)

description.example: Workshop on implementing AI tools in academic research

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific event

404.description: Event not found or not accessible

put.description: Update event details (only by event owner)

post.description: Register the authenticated user for a specific event

delete.description: Remove user registration from a specific event

get.description: Retrieve all events hosted by the authenticated user
Retrieve all events the authenticated user has registered for
Retrieve list of event attendees (only for event host)

post.description: Ban an event with reason (admin access required)
Restore a banned event to published status (admin access required)

delete.description: Permanently delete an event and all associated data (admin access required)

get.description: Search events with advanced filtering options

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query for title, description, and tags

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Filter events starting from this date

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: Filter events ending before this date

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Upload and update the authenticated user's avatar image

avatar.description: Avatar image file (JPEG, PNG, JPG, GIF, max 2MB)

delete.description: Delete the authenticated user's avatar image

get.description: Get detailed statistics for the authenticated user
